00191    private:
00192 
00193       // Ranks of sending (source) processor for each shift.
00194       FMatrix<int, Dimension, 2>  sourceRanks_;
00195 
00196       // Ranks of receiving (destination) processor for each shift.
00197       FMatrix<int, Dimension, 2>  destRanks_;
00198 
00199       // Shifts due to periodic boundary conditions in each send direction.
00200       FMatrix<int, Dimension, 2>  shift_;
00201 
00202       // Grid object with dimensions given by gridDimensions_.
00203       Grid grid_;
00204 
00205       // Number of processors in each direction.
00206       IntVector gridDimensions_;
00207 
00208       // Coordinates of this domain in processor grid.
00209       IntVector gridCoordinates_;
00210 
00211       // Rank of this processor in Cartesian communicator.
00212       int gridRank_;
00213 
00214       // Is each direction periodic (1 = true, 0 = false).
00215       FArray<bool, Dimension> gridIsPeriodic_;
00216 
00217       #if UTIL_MPI
00218 
00219       // Pointer to Intracommunicator.
00220       MPI::Intracomm* intracommPtr_;
00221 
00222       #endif
00223 
00224       // Pointer to associated Boundary object.
00225       Boundary* boundaryPtr_;
00226 
00227       // Is this object initialized (Has a grid been set?)
00228       bool isInitialized_;
00229 
00230    };

00232    #if UTIL_MPI
00233 
00237    inline MPI::Intracomm& Domain::communicator() const
00238    {
00239       assert(intracommPtr_);
00240       return *intracommPtr_; 
00241    }

00245    /*
00246    * Return processor Grid by const reference.
00247    */
00248    inline const Grid& Domain::grid() const
00249    {  
00250       assert(isInitialized_);
00251       return grid_; 
00252    }
00253 
00254    /*
00255    * Return a coordinate of this processor within grid.
00256    */
00257    inline int Domain::gridCoordinate(int i) const
00258    {  
00259       assert(isInitialized_);
00260       return gridCoordinates_[i]; 
00261    }

00275    inline bool Domain::gridIsPeriodic(int i) const
00276    {  
00277       assert(isInitialized_);

00281    /*
00282    * Rank of this processor in Cartesian communicator.
00283    */
00284    inline int Domain::gridRank() const
00285    {  
00286       assert(isInitialized_);
00287       return gridRank_;

00289 
00290    /*
00291    * Is this the master processor (gridRank == 0)?
00292    */
00293    inline bool Domain::isMaster() const
00294    {  
00295       assert(isInitialized_);
00296       return bool(gridRank_ == 0); 
00297    }
00298 
00299    /*
00300    * Rank of the processor from which to receive in transfer (i, j).
00301    */
00302    inline int Domain::sourceRank(int i, int j) const
00303    {  
00304       assert(isInitialized_);
00305       return sourceRanks_(i, j); 
00306    }
00307 
00308    /*
00309    * Rank of the processor to which to send in transfer (i, j).
00310    */
00311    inline int Domain::destRank(int i, int j) const
00312    {  
00313       assert(isInitialized_);
00314       return destRanks_(i,j); 
00315    }
00316 
00317    /*
00318    * Shift applied in direction i for transfer (i, j)
00319    */
00320    inline int Domain::shift(int i, int j) const
00321    {  
00322       assert(isInitialized_);
00323       return shift_(i, j);  
00324    }
00325 
00326    /*
00327    * Has this Domain been initialized by calling readParam?
00328    */
00329    inline bool Domain::isInitialized() const
00330    {  return isInitialized_;  }
00331 
00332    /*
00333    * Has an associated Boundary been set ?
00334    */
00335    inline bool Domain::hasBoundary() const
00336    {  return (boundaryPtr_ != 0);  }
